chapter.title: The JVM Library Plugin
chapter.para: The Gradle jvm library plugin extends the language plugins with common library related tasks. It allows bundling library for the jvm.

section.title: Usage
section.para: To use the jvm library plugin, include in your build script:
To define the name for the distribution you have to set the name property as shown below

The plugin build a distribution for your library. The distribution will package up the runtime dependencies of the library All files stored in src/dist will be added to the root of the archive distribution. You can run gradle distZip to create a ZIP containing the distribution.

section.title: Including other resources in the distribution
section.para: All of the files from the src/dist directory are copied. To include any static files in the distribution, simply arrange them in the src/dist directory, or add it to the task
